name: XP 2.0
summary: The Lectric XP 2.0 e-bike is the latest version (2021) of one of the most popular electric bikes of all time. It has nearly every feature you could imagine and it’s at a very attractive price considering it’s made with top quality components.

name: The Coupe
summary: Designed and built with Dutch craftsmanship, The Coupe is as beautiful as it is functional. Safety features like the impact-resistant expanded polypropylene (EPP) cargo box protect your most precious cargo, while sophisticated technology—like the Bafang mid-motor and auto-shifting Nuvinci hub—deliver an effortless riding experience that will have you and up to 2 kids (or dogs!) exploring your city like never before!

name: 700 Series
summary: The ultimate electric biking experience. Hydraulic fork, hydraulic brakes, color display, 14 ah Samsung cells, Schwalbe Super Moto X tires, fully integrated aluminum frame. The decision to ditch your car has never been easier. Enter the high-end electric bike market today… for half the price!

name: Flluid
summary: The FUELL Flluid-1 and Flluid-1S come standard with two large 504Wh Lithium batteries, a torque sensing 500w mid motor, and a Gates Carbon belt drive with an internally geared hub. Ride all you want with low maintenance and exceptional power.

name: Formula E Team City Racer
summary: The N+ Mercedes-Benz EQ Formula E Team City Racer eBike is designed for leisurely riding, commuting, and long distance rides. It comes in three frame sizes that each have a maximum load capacity of 220 pounds.

name: Packa Genie
summary: The Packa is a high-performing, full-featured electric cargo bike with single and dual battery options for longer range, and power capacity for any haul -- making it a natural car-replacement. Whether loading big cargo for utility or precious cargo for family time, it can get the job done.
